summary: Email correspondence between Michael C. Miller of Steptoe & Johnson LLP and an unnamed Bureau of Prisons official regarding scheduling a call and a delay in Jeffrey Epstein's attorney conference due to personal hygiene and medical assessment on July 30, 2019.

persons.name: Michael C. Miller
persons.context: Attorney from Steptoe & Johnson LLP representing Jeffrey Epstein, coordinating a call and discussing a delay in Epstein's attorney conference.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Incarcerated individual (register number 76318-054) whose attorney conference is delayed due to receiving a shower, haircut, and medical assessment.

connections.description: Miller is identified as Epstein's defense attorney, coordinating legal communications and visits.

events.title: Delay in Epstein's Attorney Conference
events.description: Epstein's scheduled attorney conference is delayed because he is getting a shower, haircut, and medical assessment.

events.title: Scheduled Attorney Call
events.description: Michael Miller schedules a 2 pm call to continue discussions from the previous day regarding his client Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Steptoe & Johnson LLP, 1114 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10036
keyFacts: Email shows routine legal coordination for Jeffrey Epstein while he was in federal custody under register number 76318-054.
Epstein was receiving personal hygiene services (shower, haircut) and a medical assessment on the morning of July 30, 2019.
Communication is between defense attorney Michael C. Miller and a Bureau of Prisons official (name redacted in 'From' field).
Document is dated July 30, 2019, approximately two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Email includes standard legal confidentiality notice from the law firm Steptoe & Johnson LLP.
